public class ButtonTest
extends Object
implements ButtonCallback
This is an Applet for Amaya demonstrating how button can be registered from Java.

This applet add a new button.

Register itself as a callback for the button

Wait for the user to click on the button

ButtonTest()

callback(int, int)
This callback is called when the user press the new button
main(String[])
the entry point of the applet.
